overview: "The Nature Boy" Ric Flair, "Rowdy" Roddy Piper, and football great "Mean" Kevin Greene challenge Kevin Nash, Scott Hall & Syxx. Football legends go at it when Steve "Mongo" McMichael battles All-Pro Reggie White. Dean Malenko defends the WCW United States Championship against Jeff Jarrett. Plus, The Steiner Brothers, Rey Misterio Jr. and much more!
title: WCW Slamboree 1997
